title: Claude Code Mastery: Advanced AI-Assisted Development
title_cs: Mistrovství v Claude Code: Pokročilý AI-asistovaný vývoj
description: Master Claude Code's advanced features - hooks, MCP servers, plan mode, and multi-agent delegation for professional software development.
description_cs: Ovládněte pokročilé funkce Claude Code - hooks, MCP servery, plan mode a multi-agent delegaci pro profesionální vývoj softwaru.
learning_objectives: Configure Claude Code hooks for automated workflows
Set up and use MCP servers for extended capabilities
Master plan mode for complex multi-file implementations
Delegate tasks effectively using multi-agent patterns
Debug effectively with AI-assisted error analysis
Integrate Claude Code with Cursor and Windsurf workflows
